ModMetaData.name: Another Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: PirateBY
ModMetaData.description:
Tweaks: - Shift + Click for MASS assign areas for Colonists and Animals (like in mod AnimalTab) - Hold Ctrl to drop one item from the pawn inventory instead of a stack
Tweaks for HardcoreSK mod: - Show TPS always (Not only in Dev mode now) - Show RaidPoints near TPS
Tweaks from ReplaceStuff: - Corner tiles are buildable and mineable from inside
Tweaks from ShareTheLoad: - Deliver resources even if there's not enough to finish the building
Tweaks from 4M Mehni's Misc Modifications: - Show names for hostile animals - Show what pawns are in a relationship when assigning beds
Tweaks from TD Enhancement Pack: - Level-up arrows indicate skill learning in Character Tab - A little icon to show research is in progress
Mod can work with 4M Mehni's Misc Modifications, TD Enhancement Pack. Settings from 4M Mehni's Misc Modifications and TD Enhancement Pack will be used if they are installed!
All this tweaks can be enabled/disabled in mod settings.
ISSUES: https://github.com/bananasss00/RW-AnotherTweaks/issues
